Name: Over the Moon Bundle
DAVIA Description: Wouldn't you be Over the Moon if you received this sublime stack of Coco-luxe confections?! This is a truly exceptional gift, and will thrill any chocolate lover, they might even be inclined to share... or not. Includes one nine-piece box of Peanut Butter Bites, one nine-piece box of Dark Chocolate Truffles, one nine-piece box of Milk Chocolate Truffles, one nine-piece box of Afternoon Truffles, and one nine-piece box of Assorted Dessert Flavor Truffles.

Name: 36 Piece Caramel Assortment Box
DAVIA Description: Make any gift truly memorable with this big, gorgeous box of caramels. A dozen of each of our 3 flavors: Butterscotch Caramels, Brown Sugar Praline Caramel and Shoe Fly Pie Molasses Caramels.

Name: Chocolate Classic Truffle Collection, 24-pc
DAVIA Description: What’s better than 12 of our most popular truffles in one box? How about two of our 12 most popular truffles in one box? That’s what you’ll get with this assortment, all wrapped up in a beautiful blue box and sealed with a bow. 24 piece

Name: S'Mores Kit
DAVIA Description: Relive your childhood campfire memories with this S'Mores kit from Recchiuti. A collection of eight deluxe grahams, signature 85 percent bittersweet chocolate and nine handmade vanilla bean marshmallows combine to make four S'Mores sandwiches or eight open faced treats.

Name: Peanut Butter Bites Truffles 9 pieces
DAVIA Description: Nothing goes together quite like peanut butter and chocolate. You'll rediscover that fact with this box of nine artisan Artisan Chocolates blended with peanut butter.

Name: Milk Chocolate Truffles 9 pieces
DAVIA Description: Nine milk chocolate favorites will be found in this box, which contains three pieces each of malted milk, banana split and German chocolate candies.

Name: Assorted Carmels 9 pieces
DAVIA Description: Three pieces each of butterscotch, brown sugar praline, and shoo fly pie caramels await you in this box, each sprinkled with a dash of American salt.

Name: Fleur de Sel Caramels, 16 pieces
DAVIA Description: This box of 16 dark chocolate-covered chewy caramels delivers an optimal balance of salty and sweet. Recchiuti's Fleur de Sel morsels feature delicate floral notes that bring out rich, smoky tones in the caramel.

Name: Afternoon Chocolate Truffles 9 pieces
DAVIA Description: Nine delicate truffles perfect for pairing with your afternoon tea. Each beautiful box contains three of the following flavors: Chai tea, mocha, and green tea.

Name: Green Box, 8 pieces
DAVIA Description: Recchiuti's unique Lemon Verbena and Lavendar Vanilla flavors will be found in The Green Box, creating a delicate mix of fresh herb and tea-infused Artisan Chocolates for the chocolate lover in your life.

Name: Creativity Explored Box "Cakes", 8 pieces
DAVIA Description: These Creativity Explored artisan Artisan Chocolates are a delicious way to indulge while supporting San Francisco's artists.  $2 from each sale of delectable Burnt Caramel Artisan Chocolates directly supports artists with developmental disabilities. Good for the tastebuds and the soul!

Name: Peppermint Thins, 24 pieces
DAVIA Description: Peppermint and chocolate is a classic combination, and this box of 24 pieces of peppermint thins from Bay Area-based Recchiuti, made with a custom blend of 64% semisweet chocolate, may become your new favorite.

Name: Red Wine Pairing Box, 9 pieces
DAVIA Description: For those who love wine and chocolate, Bay Area chocolatier Recchiuti presents this box of nine gourmet morsels, each with a suggested red wine pairing guaranteed to satisfy all the senses.

Name: Dark Chocolate Truffles 9  pieces
DAVIA Description: A beautiful box of nine artisan dark chocolate truffles that are almost too good to share. Every box has three pieces of each of the following flavors: Devil's food, double cherry, and after-dinner mint.

Name: Chocolate Bees, 9 pieces
DAVIA Description: Each salted caramel chocolate bee seems to be adored by just about everyone that happens to be lucky enough to receive one as a gift (just check out the reviews below).  Not chewy like a store bought caramel, our bee Artisan Chocolates have a liquid caramel center and a clear, caramelized honey taste. This unique flavor comes naturally from the fragrant basswood honey, supplied by the Draper Family Apiaries in Millerton, PA. Once filled, each of the nine bees is carefully painted by hand with a paper-thin layer of yellow and black cocoa butter. Guaranteed to please the palate just as much as the eye.

Name: Rust Box, 8 pieces
DAVIA Description: Chocolate dreams will be realized with this eight-piece box of luxury Artisan Chocolates that makes for a perfect "Thank You" gift. Eight pieces of deluxe chocolate will be found in the box, including Recchiuti's Rose Caramel and Kona Coffee flavors.

Name: Caramels to the Third Power, 24 pieces
DAVIA Description: If you're looking for caramel overload, this is it. A 24-piece box containing some of the most amazing caramels from Recchiuti. Included in the box are pices of Fleur de Sel Caramel, a new butterscotch caramel, and dark chocolate caramels.

Name: Key Lime Pears, 12 pieces
DAVIA Description: Paper-thin slices of pear are delicately dipped in chocolate to present this wonderfully tart treat from Recchiutu in the Bay Area.

Name: Bar Quattro, 4 bars
DAVIA Description: Tied with an elegant satin bow, these chocolate bars are more than a snack, they're a very classy gift. Four different bars, each with their own personality and purpose, including bittersweet chocolate, semisweet chocolate, dark milk chocolate, and the feve (a bittersweet bar with crunchy cacao nibs.)

Name: Chocolate Figs, 6 pieces
DAVIA Description: These chocolate figs are as good as they get. John & Kira import tender, organic dried Calabacita figs from a small family farm in Spain then fill them with a silky smooth, whiskey infused Valrhona dark chocolate ganache. The press these figs have received would make any aspiring actor envious. They appeared, with John and Kira of course, on the Martha Stewart Show and have been featured not once but twice in Oprah's magazine. Wine Spectator loves them as well.  They are then hand-dipped in 62% dark chocolate and carefully placed in their own gift box . . . finished with a letter-pressed card.

Name: Gourmet Roasted Nuts (2 lbs.)
DAVIA Description: Your recipient will go nuts for this 2 lb. tin of almonds, cashews, peanuts and pecans from Gary Poppins. All nuts are fresh roasted and packed fresh from the roaster.

Name: Almond Toffee (8 oz.)
DAVIA Description: The perfect comfort food, our Almond Toffee is mixed by hand in small batches and crafted to be both decadent and delicious. We begin with real butter and sugar, stir in Almonds lovingly grown by Chris and Marcie Baugher at Baugher Ranch Organics in Orland, California, and then top it with 62% Valrhona dark chocolate. The almonds can be bought directly at the Baugher Ranch website . . . www.bro-almonds.com. 8 oz.

Name: Irresistible Fruit Squares, 28 pieces
DAVIA Description: This 28pc. fruit square assortment highlights strawberries, raspberries, blackberries and apricots. To make them, John & Kira heat pure fruit puree to a high temperature, mix in sugar and pectin in small amounts, then slowly cook the mixture until it arrives at just the right consistency. The puree is then poured into a square frame, allowed to cool, then cut into one and a quarter inch squares. Finally, the cut squares are tossed in organic sugar three separate times over a period of two days. They are as fresh and supple as could be and are better than any French pate de fruits we have found. Gluten-Free.

Name: New Orleans Finest - Gift Box, 1 lb.
DAVIA Description: This irresistible combination of creamy pralines, tortues, almond toffee and Mississippi mud is an invitation to the best confections that New Orleans has to offer, all Southern Candymakers.

Name: Sir Francis Bacon Peanut Brittle, 8 oz. box
DAVIA Description: Does bacon plus peanut brittle equal genius? If your special recipient is a bacon lover, he might think so after trying this unique treat from Sir Francis Bacon. When peanut brittle is infused with bacon flavors, it creates a sweet, salty, and savory treat that will make any bacon lover come back for more.

Name: Pates de Fruits, 20 pieces
DAVIA Description: The dazzling flavors of fresh fruit burst from each elegant square gele. A long time French favorite, this box of 20 pieces includes four flavors: Morello cherry, passion fruit, blueberry, and pear lime.

Name: Hazelnut Toffee, 8 ounces
DAVIA Description: The perfect comfort food, this Hazelnut Toffee is hand-mixed in small batches and crafted to be both decadent and delicious. John & Kira begin with real butter and sugar, stir in Barcelona Hazelnuts grown by the Holmquist family at their orchard in Lynden, Washington, and then top it with 62% Valrhona dark chocolate.

Name: The Perfect Pear Gift Basket
DAVIA Description: The Perfect Pear Gift Basket offers your special recipient the irresistibly sweet taste of fresh hand-picked D'Anjou pears to create a gourmet treat unlike any other. Includes 3 red D'Anjou pears and 6 D'Anjou pears arriving in an attractive wooden crate.

Name: Tasty Italian-inspired Pork and Beef Meatballs, Set of 50
DAVIA Description: Based on a pair of favorite Williams-Sonoma recipes, these savory meatballs are sure to be pleasing. Two classic varietes are included in this 50-meatball pack of easy-to-prepare and delicious to eat meatballs.

Name: Buffalo Jerky
DAVIA Description: Buffalo jerky is a genuine treat of the American plains. One taste of this lean, robust, and meaty treat and your special recipient will know what it's so popular. It's a delicious gift for meat lovers, and delivered in western-style cloth bags.

Name: Grass-Fed Australian Beef Tenderloin, 5-5.5 lbs.
DAVIA Description: Beef tenderloin: Just the words make the average meat-eater begin to drool. This grass-fed beef tenderloin is amazingly juicy, with an intense, rich flavor and melt-in-your-mouth texture. It comes from cattle pasture raised by small Australian farms.

Name: Berkshire Pork Milanese Chops, 4 1 lb. chops
DAVIA Description: Dry, overcooked pork chops are a thing of the past with D'Artagnan's richly-marbled Berkshire Milanese chops, perfect for quick weeknight cooking. (Four 1-lb. chops)

Name: Duck Leg Confit (6 pieces)
DAVIA Description: D'Artagnan Meats takes the meatiest, most succulent moulard duck legs they can find and slowly stews them with herbs and spices to create their delicious signature duck leg confit, also known as "preserved" duck leg or confit de canard. (Six 5-ounce pieces in each order.)

Name: 24 2-ounce Tenderloin Medallions
DAVIA Description: Allen Brothers' buttery beef medallions are cut from prized tenderloins. Also known as tournedos, these two-ounce mini filets are the perfect addition to a mixed grill or kebabs.

Name: Four 10-ounce USDA Prime Boneless Ribeye Steaks
DAVIA Description: Thick-cut from Allen Brothers' exceptional USDA Prime rib roasts, these wet-aged ribeye steaks are distinguished by their rich marbling and natural "flavor kernel" that runs through each steak.

Name: Four 14-ounce USDA Prime Boneless Strip Steaks
DAVIA Description: A fine texture and rich marbling combined with Allen Brothers' special wet aging process give these 1.75 inch thick steaks their robust flavor and juicy tenderness.

Name: 12 Maryland-Style Crab Cakes
DAVIA Description: These crab cakes are handmade using a century-old Maryland recipe that calls for 65 percent sweet, meaty chunks -- not shavings -- of fresh, all-natural blue crab, plus a delicately flavored blend of breadcrumbs, mayonnaise, mustard and spices. Each order includes six packages of two crab cakes.

Name: Four 10-ounce USDA Choice Filet Mignon
DAVIA Description: Allen Brothers' complete-trim filets mignon are the leanest cuts of USDA Choice tenderloin available. They are trimmed of all exterior fat, yet marbled enough to deliver full flavor.

Name: 12 Eight-ounce Wagyu Steak Burgers
DAVIA Description: Put on your "Burger Lover" grilling apron and treat your recipient to Allen Brothers' Kobe-style Wagyu steak burger. This beef is quality enough to enter into a best burger competition, and anyone who tries it will consider themselves a winner.

Name: 12 Eight-ounce Bison Burgers
DAVIA Description: Whether you're looking for a change of taste or a change in diet, Allen Brothers' all-natural, 100 percent bison meat patties are a delicious alternative to beef. They're low in fat, cholesterol and calories and high in protein, juiciness and flavor.

Name: Four 10-ounce Bison Sirloin Strip Steaks
DAVIA Description: For a full-flavored meat experience, you can't beat Allen Brothers' bison sirloin strip steaks. Grilled, broiled, or sauteed, they're sure to expand the meat-loving horizons of your recipient.

Name: Four 5-6 ounce Maine and Canadian Lobster Tails
DAVIA Description: Firm and flavorful, with a distinctly sweet, buttery taste, these lobster tails sourced from Maine and the coast of Canada are a perfect complement for corn and potatoes, or any other side that invites a succulent piece of lobster along its side.

Name: Four 12-ounce Wagyu Ribeye Steaks
DAVIA Description: Also called Delmonico steak, thick-cut from Allen Brothers' succuluent rib roasts, these steaks are distinguished by their rich marbling and the natural "flavor kernel" that runs through each cut. It is this marbling that slowly melts and bastes the meat throughout the cooking process, imparting a mellow, prime rib flavor.

Name: Ventreche - French Pancetta, 2.75 lbs.
DAVIA Description: D'Artagnan Ventreche, or French pancetta, is salt-cured and flavored with pepper and garlic -- makes a perfect pairing with pasta, fish and chicken, as well as a great addition to soups, stews and Cassoulet.

Name: Four 20-22 oz. Domestic Pasture-Raised Bone In Beef Ribeye Steak
DAVIA Description: These boneless beef ribeye steaks are a carnivore's dream come true! Weighing in at 20-22 ounces each, these mouthwatering steaks are rich with clean beef flavor, ultra juicy, and meltingly tender.

Name: Illuminated Dog Leash
DAVIA Description: This colorful light-up leash can be seen from up to a quarter-mile in the dark. It’s made of reinforced nylon, so it’s strong and lightweight.

Name: 3MM Felt Wool Tablet Sleeve for Ipad
DAVIA Description: Modern and stylish sleeve is made using 3MM merino felt wool. Offers great protection for iPad tablets. Leather strap is attached to sleeve for added support. Felt sleeve can be specifically adapted for both the iPad and iPad 2 tablets.

Name: Sarah's Key
DAVIA Description: Paris, July 1942: Sarah, a ten year-old girl, is brutally arrested with her family by the French police in the Vel' d'Hiv' roundup, but not before she locks her younger brother in a cupboard in the family's apartment, thinking that she will be back within a few hours. Paris, May 2002: On Vel' d'Hiv's 60th anniversary, journalist Julia Jarmond is asked to write an article about this black day in France's past. Through her contemporary investigation, she stumbles onto a trail of long-hidden family secrets that connect her to Sarah. Julia finds herself compelled to retrace the girl's ordeal, from that terrible term in the Vel d'Hiv', to the camps, and beyond. As she probes into Sarah's past, she begins to question her own place in France, and to reevaluate her marriage and her life. Tatiana de Rosnay offers us a brilliantly subtle, compelling portrait of France under occupation and reveals the taboos and silence that surround this painful episode.

Name: One Day
DAVIA Description: It’s 1988 and Dexter Mayhew and Emma Morley have only just met. But after only one day together, they cannot stop thinking about one another. Over twenty years, snapshots of that relationship are revealed on the same day—July 15th—of each year. Dex and Em face squabbles and fights, hopes and missed opportunities, laughter and tears. And as the true meaning of this one crucial day is revealed, they must come to grips with the nature of love and life itself.

Name: The Help
DAVIA Description: Be prepared to meet three unforgettable women: Twenty-two-year-old Skeeter has just returned home after graduating from Ole Miss. She may have a degree, but it is 1962, Mississippi, and her mother will not be happy till Skeeter has a ring on her finger. Skeeter would normally find solace with her beloved maid Constantine, the woman who raised her, but Constantine has disappeared and no one will tell Skeeter where she has gone.

Name: Original Baklava (2 boxes)
DAVIA Description: Hand made with 60 paper-thin phyllo pastry leaves, this buttered treat is layered with minced walnuts, cinnamon and honey filling, then smothered with even more honey and topped with a squeeze of lemon.

Name: Peach & Berry Pie
DAVIA Description: Peaches, berries, and pies, oh my! This pie is full of tart, firm blueberries and raspberries, balanced by tender and sweet peaches, all put together inside a deep-dish pastry shell that is certain to please.

Name: Cinnamon Swirls Gift Box, 2 Swirls (1lb each)
DAVIA Description: These handcrafted pastries are nutty, sweetly saucy, ready to slice and enjoy. Pastry chefs roll them by hand because there's no other way to achieve this kind of homestyle quality your recipient will love.

Name: Cheesecake Sampler, 4 Flavors
DAVIA Description: Is your recipient the kind of person who can never decide what dessert is the best choice? If so, this cheesecake sampler from Harry & David is the perfect solution, with four flavors of cheesecake including three slices each of Bing cherry chocolate, Moose Munch Snack, triple chocolate and strawberry delight.

Name: Best From The Bakery, 4lbs 6 oz
DAVIA Description: Handmade goodness includes pineapple macadamia nut cake, lemon pound cake, baklava, walnut chocholate chunk cookies, white chocolate raspberry, lemon shortbread, maple walnut, peanut butter, chocolate chocolate chunk, chocolate chip, fruit gallettes and more. It's a cookie wonderland your recipient will love.

Name: Bubby's Triple Berry Pie
DAVIA Description: Putting a fork in Bubby's Triple Berry pie will evoke memories of stepping back in time 50 years, enjoying the juicy delicate flavors of ripe blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries with a lattice top.

Name: Gourmet Potato Latkes, Set of 24
DAVIA Description: This set of 24 large potato pancakes are perfect companions for some caviar and smoked salmon or equally delicious on their own. Hand made using a family recipe, these latkes are crispy and golden brown on the outside with a moist interior.

Name: Mini Crab Cakes, Set of 32
DAVIA Description: Handcrafted with prized blue crab meat, these Maryland-style lump crab cakes are bursting with exceptionally sweet taste and tender, delicate texture, with just enough filling to retain their shape.

Name: Vanilla and Chocolate Whoopie Pies - 12 pieces
DAVIA Description: Many an informed palate claim that The Cranberry Island Kitchen makes whoopie pies better than Bobby Flay.  Made with local, free-range eggs, homemade butter, Maine spring water and Maine sea salt, Cranberry Island's whoopie pies beat out Bobby's on a recent Food Network Throwdown. Soft and cakey, these chocolate and vanilla pies are filled with creamy and sweet vanilla bean frosting.Â

Name: Sweet Roll Sampler, Set of 18
DAVIA Description: Why choose when you can have it all? If you don't know which sweet roll they'll want or you'll crave in the morning, you're in luck. Our sampler delivers 6 Cinnamon Rolls, 6 Chocolate Cinnamon Rolls and 6 Nutty Sticky Buns. Certified Kosher.

Name: Peanut Butter Milk Chocolate Chunk Cookies
DAVIA Description: This a rich, chewy cookie that is loaded with creamy peanut butter and premium Callebaut milk chocolate chunks. Sweet Jazmines regulars love taking two of these cookies and sandwiching a thin layer of their favorite ice cream between them for an unforgettable treat.

Name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Brownies - 6 pieces
DAVIA Description: This is the brownie equivalent of a rich, velvety peanut butter cup.  A layer of creamy peanut butter runs through the middle of rich chocolate.  Its flavor fusion at its finest.

Name: Croissants, Set of 15
DAVIA Description: Master pastry chef Jean-Yves Charon prepares these croissants in the traditional French style, using butter and ultra-thin layers of yeast dough before folding and cutting the pastries by hand. Each order includes 15 of the easy to prepare delicacies, shipped frozen.

Name: Apple Turnovers, Set of 12
DAVIA Description: This set of 12 flaky, golden apple turnover pastries is shipped frozen and simply needs to be thawed, scored, and baked before they can be served warm from the over and bring a smile to the face of anyone who tries one.

Name: 12 Blissful Brownies
DAVIA Description: Unbelievably rich and moist, these heavenly brownies from Williams-Sonoma are made to deliver intense flavor from the finest ingredients. Made by hand in small batches, the brownies are loaded with Guittard chocolate chunks.

Name: One Dozen Blondies and Brunettes
DAVIA Description: These are our quintessential classic blondies and brunettes. Take them to afternoon tea. Take them on a picnic. Take them to Bungalow. Wherever they go they fit right in. Like the perfect chocolate chip cookie. But better.

Name: Cheryl's Cookies & Brownies - 18 cookies, 4 brownies
DAVIA Description: Our delicious assortments are perfect for your office parties and family get-togethers. We've included our most popular flavors of individually wrapped gourmet cookies and brownies delivered fresh to your door!

Name: Classic Cinnamon Rolls, Set of 6
DAVIA Description: Six rolls, with sweet icing to drizzle on top when they're fresh from the oven. Certified Kosher.

Name: Chocolate Caramel Pecan Brownies - 6 pieces
DAVIA Description: Rich caramel tangles with salty pecans to form this buttery, perfect combination known as Blissful's Chocolate Caramel Pecan Brownie.

Name: Brown Sugar Brownies - 6 pieces
DAVIA Description: Loaded with vanilla, butter, brown sugar and chocolate chunks, these are Blissful's slightly savory version of the Blondie. Make over a milkshake by blending in bits of this cakey confection for a slightly salty, sweet treat.Â

Name: Bluberry Lemon Muffins, Set of 6
DAVIA Description: Our blueberry lemon muffins are a classic that delights tastebuds everywhere. This muffin is bursting with juicy blueberries and fresh lemon zest and is finished with a light lemon vodka glaze.  In other words, perfection.

Name: Cheryl's Bake Sale Cookie Box - Set of 24
DAVIA Description: Our Bake Sale cookie collection includes an individually wrapped assortment of our top cookie flavors delivered in our Signature Bow Gift Boxes. Now is the time to stock up on Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal Raisin, Chocolate Chocolate Chip,Â Sugar, Snickerdoodle and of course our famous Buttercream Frosted Cut-out Cookies. Cheryl's cookies are perfect for quick desserts and summertime treats!

Name: Vera Wang Lavender Rose Bouquet - Vase Included
DAVIA Description: The grace of a beautiful rose. Intoxicating fragrance. Petals that blush in the sunlight.  A bouquet of stunning lavender roses and assorted greens.

Name: Vera Wang White Calla Lily Bouquet - 15 Stems - Vase Included
DAVIA Description: Luminous and radiant. A kiss of color. A glimpse of modern, yet classic beauty. A bouquet of 15 white mini calla lilies presented with a clear glass vase.

Name: Vera Wang Sunset Bouquet 18 Stems - Vase Included
DAVIA Description: A bouquet of white Asiatic Lilies, Bells of Ireland, orange spray roses, white roses and lush greens is presented in a 7-3/4" modern glass vase.  Approximately 19-inches in height.

Name: Dreamland Pink Bouquet, 14 Stems - Vase Included
DAVIA Description: The Dreamland Pink Bouquet is a soft display of floral wonder. The finest brilliant pink roses sit amongst a cloud of pink Peruvian lilies to create a bouquet your special recipient will love.

Name: Assorted Tulip Bouquet - 15 stems - Vase Included
DAVIA Description: Tulip lovers will be big fans of the Rush of Color Assorted Tulip Bouquet, an arrangement guaranteed to bring a splash of color to any special occasion or celebration. Fifteen of the finest tulips are delivered with a glass vase.

Name: Yellow Rose and Lily Bouquet, 14 stems
DAVIA Description: Bright yellow roses and yellow Peruvian lilies combine to form a great bouquet for whoever you send this to. Altogether, 14 stems of Premium Flowers form this arrangement that will brighten its recipients' day.

Name: 100 Blooms of Peruvian Lillies
DAVIA Description: It'll be a floral explosion in the home of whoever you send this bouquet of 25 stems of Peruvian lilies. Each stem has four to five blooms, all of which will combine to add vibrant color to any room.

Name: Roses, Anastasia mums, Peruvian Lilies and Green Dot Poms, 13 stems
DAVIA Description: Two yellow roses, three orange roses, three Anastasia mums, three Peruvian lilies, two green dot poms and three ruscus combine to bring a bright bouquet of sunshine to the special recipient of this arrangement.

Name: Yellow and Blue Tulips and Irises, 20 stems
DAVIA Description: The Happy Happy Birthday arrangement is great for birthdays, but also will make other days happy for recipients with its 10 yellow tulips and 10 blue irises, which combined stands about 15 inches tall.

Name: SunPremium Flowers Radiance, 7 stems
DAVIA Description: Send sunPremium Flowers and a little sunshine to brighten up someone's day. This gorgeous and cheerful bouquet of seven yellow sunPremium Flowers are shipped in "bud" form to ensure they'll reach full bloom after arrival.

Name: Lily Rose Bouquet, 16 stems
DAVIA Description: Send a splash of color and brighten someone's day with this bouquet of 10 Peruvian lilies and six multi-colored roses. Peruvian lilies are symbolic of friendship and devotion and are sure to warm your special recipients' heart.

Name: Pink Prelude Tulip Bouquet, 15 stems
DAVIA Description: The Pink Prelude Tulip Bouquet opens its blushing petals to celebrate the joy and beauty of life's most significant occasions. Fifteen stems of the finest pink tulips create a remarkable bouquet to express happy wishes.

Name: Sweet Surprises Bouquet, 8 stems
DAVIA Description: Send a sweet surprise in the form of pink and white Premium Flowers. Hot pink spray roses, pink mini carnations, and white daisy pompons are sweetly arranged in a clear vase and trimmed with pink ribbon. Each arrangement contains eight stems.

Name: Calla Lily Bouquet, 18 stems - includes vase
DAVIA Description: Dark plum, vibrant pink and bright white calla lilies comprise the Amethyst Riches Bouquet, an arrangement that delivers a message of sophistication and beauty.

Name: Roses, Lilies, Daisies and Pompon, 17 stems - includes vase
DAVIA Description: The Sunny Sentiments Bouquet was created to bring sun-filled days straight to its recipient. Yellow roses and Peruvian lilies are highlighted in this mix with traditional daisies and green button poms.

Name: One Dozen Rainbow Roses
DAVIA Description: A bouquet of one dozen South American roses. The shorter length of the stems of these roses delivers a more full feel than typical long-stemmed roses. These Premium Flowers are shipped fresh, budding and ready to bloom.

Name: Orchid Bouquet - Vase Included
DAVIA Description: Their spirit rises to every occasion, echoing the beauty of life's limitless journey. Offer your hand and heart with our exquisite pink cymbidium orchids. Perfectly situated in a sophisticated and superior 14-inch clear glass tapered bullet vase, this unique bouquet creates a dazzling display of unmatched elegance. Includes: 1 stem of a pink cymbidium orchid, exotic foliage and a superior 14-inch clear glass tapered bullet vase. Approx. 15H x 7W

Name: Cymbidium Orchid Bouquet in Baccarat Crystal Vase
DAVIA Description: An enchanting expression of blushing beauty, this exceptional bouquet delights at every turn. Deep pink and pale pink mini cymbidium orchids mingle to create a most attractive bouquet. Seated in a Baccarat Crystal Clear Wave Vase made of the finest full-lead French crystal, this bouquet is a spellbinding expression of classic elegance and charm.  Gift includes 4 stems of assorted pink mini cymbidium orchids exhibiting 10 to 15 blooms per stem, and a Baccarat Crystal Clear Wave Vase.  Approximately 18"H x 14"W.

Name: Regional BBQ Sauces, 5 Bottles
DAVIA Description: This selection of regional BBQ sauces will allow the barbecue lover in your life to sample some of the best sauces from around the country, ranging from Kansas City-based Cowtown barbecue sauce, to Tennessee's BBQ Fight Club Kickin Chicken White Sauce.

Name: Sauce and Marinade Gift Pack, 3 bottles
DAVIA Description: Jim Beam is one of the leading distillers of great whiskey in our country, so the great flavors are brought to sauce in this Jim Beam Gift Pack, which includes 11 ounces of Jim Beam steak sauce, 18 ounces of Jim Beam BBQ sauce, and 13 ounces of Jim Beam marinade. Gift set delivered with a Jim Beam basting brush.

Name: Hot Sauce Gift Set, 4 bottles
DAVIA Description: Love is a burnin' thing, and with these sauces, it'll have a fiery sting. The Ring of Fire Hot Sauce Gift Set comes with an extra bonus of beef jerky. Contained in the gift set is one bottle of Ring of Fire Original Host Sauce, a bottle of Ring of Fire Tomatillo & Roasted Garlic Hot Sauce, and one ounce of beef jerky. (12.5 ounces of hot sauce in the gift set.)

Name: Cookout Sampler Pack, 5 items
DAVIA Description: This pack has everything your special recipient will need to have the perfect cookout. The kit contains one of each of the following: Fighting Cock BBQ Sauce, Stonewall Kitchen Salsa Verde Hot Sauce, Stonewall Kitchen Margarita Mixer, Stonewall Kitchen Chicken & Pork Seasoning, and Lynchburg Tennessee BBQ Sauce.

Name: The Hand Written Card
DAVIA Description: Beautiful handwritten card to provide a wonderful touch point with the important person in your life.

Name: The Hand Written Card
DAVIA Description: Beautiful handwritten card to provide a wonderful touch point with the important person in your life.

Name: Papyrus
DAVIA Description: Beautiful handwritten card to provide a wonderful touch point with the important person in your life.

Name: Papyrus
DAVIA Description: Beautiful handwritten card to provide a wonderful touch point with the important person in your life.

Name: Papyrus
DAVIA Description: Beautiful handwritten card to provide a wonderful touch point with the important person in your life.
